author: PatriciaFAlves
title: Great location
text:
I have staying 3 times in this hotel for the last 30 days and I am very pleased with it. The rooms are nice, the bed has the best mattress I have experienced. I have statues in 3 different rooms now and all have been a positive experience. It is quiet, modern, and comfy.
The breakfast is not the best I have had, the scrambled eggs are not recommended but overall it has what you need to have a good start of the day. It is a typical Novotel breakfast..
The staff is very friendly and always smiling.
I haven't tried the spa area yet but hope to do so the next time I stay there.
